text: once upon a time a trip to a golf school
was more of a winter vacation than a
chance to work at making your game
better sure you hit some shots with a
pro and played some golf but then it was
time to hit the cocktail hour sample
some wine and have a big roast beef
dinner next morning you'd wake up with a
hangover and do it all over again the
modern Golf Academy is not your parents
golf school these days Golf Academy zar
surfacing around the country with a new
approach that focuses not only on golf
technique but on nutrition stamina and
how you can fix your golf swing in the
gym what started with a dream about 7-8
years ago I wanted to do something to
share my passion for golf and fitness
with my personal coaches I visited
Annika Sorenstam golf academy in Orlando
not retired from the LPGA Tour sorenstam
two years ago created a whole body

fitting so we really feel like we're in
compasses and it's all about the

inspirational experiences to our guests
like a lot of modern golf schools the
Annika Academy has specialists who work

kaifu sir who has a lot of theories
